metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3312 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in drivers/cpufreq/qcom-cpufreq-hw.c in cpufreq subsystem in the Linux Kernel. This flaw, during device unbind will lead to double release problem leading to denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage now end-of-life').
